name: Coffee Gang
description:
In Coffee Gang you’re playing Fico, a cup of coffee, who finds himself alone surrounded by his worst enemies; the gang of cups of teas and smoothies. Use your weapon in order to dehydrate them. But be careful because they come by waves so be strategic or you’ll lose your coffee.  

After being caught by surprise from the rival gang composed by tea, chocolate and smoothie you’ll have to survive against them while killing as many as possible to reach the best score. In order to do it you’ll have to move around using the cup controller (or a keyboard)  and to shoot them. 

The cup controller is an alternative controller who was created for this game. You can move Fico, the main character, using only the alternative controller. If you want to do the controller at your home here's the way to do it, you'll have to put this code in the Arduino : 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1FJEHAcXwsCS71IcjAXcyPDMs_6mXyj0o/view?usp=shari...
